column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hands down the best Ramen joint in town thus far (and I have pretty much tried them all) If I'm having my ramen hankering
column2: I'll come here because it's consistently delicious and never disappoints. Can't believe it has taken me so long to write a review for this place because I used to come at least once a week. Now due to it's popularity
column3: it gets packed quick so be prepared to wait at least 30 mins or stalk out a bar seat.
